Timeline

  • Cornell (Aug 2017 - Present)

    At Cornell, I studied Computer Science and minored in business. I have recieved Dean’s List every semester and I am an Irwin and Joan Jacobs Scholar.

  • High School (Sept 2013 - Jun 2017)

    I attended Bridgewater Raritan High School. I graduated at the top 5% of my class of 750 students. I took AP Computer Science and AP CS Principles and recieved a 5 on both AP exams.
